column5: Anybody tried it yet?  They make a great line-up of ice fishing lures, wondering if the new line lives up to their reputation?
I tried it but stripped it off after 1st use. Too much memory for my liking. Back to berkley line. Cheers Jeff
Try Fireline Crystal, best line I've used
Seems to be a common problem with a bunch of the so called ice lines.  Thanks for the input.
Trilene XL here...  no problems yet 20 years +  I have no reason to try anything else

I jumped to the ice lines at first.. found them (mono) to be crap. If you need the blue to see your line.. that's all they are good for. I went back to the same Trilene I fish with in the summer in 6 and 8 lb depending on the targeted species and I have one rod with Powerpro ice on it for in the hut when fishing deep.
Never tried Northland so can't comment on it..... I use Power Pro Ice for my jigging rod and Dacron on the tipups.  Leechman
